name: Kris Sutton
text: My husband and I visited after a long day on the road. We ordered small salad and a small garden pizza. The person behind the counter was new, and after three attempts to enter my order had to ask for help. We paid and waited at a table. ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Haniford
text: The staff who work here are truly wonderful people. Pizza is great, people are great. The perfect eatery.

name: Ashlee Rusk
text: I love the pizza and the prices are great

name: Kyle Lancial
text: Amazing tasting meat lovers pizza. And they deliver to the pilot truck stop down the road. Will definitely order from them again. Very friendly staff and great delivery time as well. A++++ in my book.

name: See Stillhard
text: One of the best pizza i ever got.   When I ordered a take out.

name: Ernie Throckmorton
text: Loved the thick crust pepperoni pizza and also thought the pizza bread was good

name: Megan Greaver
text: Amazing food and I got my food really fast

name: Jason White
text: Clean , friendly and the food is good

name: Sherry Cox
text: Great place to eat....

name: john smith
text: Pizza Hut has always been my favorite since I can remember. But it changed when I had Marcos pizza. It really is the best in town

name: Paul Strain
text: Not a spot to dine in, only a couple of tables. But the pizza was good, and quick.

name: kameryn renee
text: pretty much everything is customizable and their delievery is freaky fast! my sub came LOADED so i wasnt getting played for what i payed. amazing flavors and friendly crew!! will definitely be ordering again.

name: S gert
text: Too many other pizza options in town, only go anymore when there is the cheapest deal on pizza. Cheesesticks usually so sopping with grease, that they have been dubbed the Greasesticks. Old world pepperoni is the best pepperoni you can use on üçï though üòä then u get grease pockets to go with your grease sticks üòõ

name: Audrey George
text: Great pizza. You pay a little more but the quality is worth it.

name: travis pindell
text: Love this place, like the only place in town to cash you out for a hundred on delivery.

name: Michael Knee
text: Excellent pizza, a little pricey, but worth it!

name: Mason Gaskin
text: Great staff all are very friendly pizza is amazing 5 stars all around

name: A M
text: They all have swag there. Pretty swaggy place if you ask me.

name: Trackside Craig
text: Best pizza in Indiana.

name: walker leslie
text: Josh is the person to talk to for great service!!!!

name: Shark RESTAURANT
text: Very good food #1 pizza

name: Eddie Berg
text:
Great pizza loved it
Super friendly staff

name: Joe Sellars
text: Always hot and ready at right time

name: Peckster McClain
text: Fast,good and friendly.

name: Chris Banks
text: For cville, they have been the only place that can get me a pizza in less than an hour

name: brian weifenbach
text: Love their pizza

name: Jeff Moore
text: Good portion of toppings and great flavor!

name: Zachariah Cannon
text: Okay

name: Kyle Ashburn
text: Only had it once

name: Rhonda Thornbury
text: Great pizza and bradstix

name: caleb surber
text: Mediocre pizza but great location

name: John Yates
text: Easy online ordering of pizza and new release movie together!

name: Michael Crispin
text: This is by far the worst pizza I have ever had it was cold in spots and before I could even try it I had to take paper towel to it to soak up the grease  of the top.
